title: Business cards
content:
Just ran into [this post](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109011121/http:/typophile.com/node/328#comment-1875) in a 5 year old thread and it called for a show of business cards. It has a link to another thread, but the link is broken.

I'm sending my cards to the printer's on Tuesday, and I post the photos once I get them. But I also thought it might be worth repeating the 2003 thread.

Anyone's interested ?

I'm sure quite a few of you have cards that are just waiting to be bragged about :)
author: apankrat
